How many people are affected by nephrogenic diabetes insipidus ?,"The prevalence of nephrogenic diabetes insipidus is unknown, although the condition is thought to be rare. The acquired form occurs more frequently than the hereditary form.",GHR,nephrogenic diabetes insipidus
What are the genetic changes related to nephrogenic diabetes insipidus ?,"The hereditary form of nephrogenic diabetes insipidus can be caused by mutations in at least two genes. About 90 percent of all case
